data.message: wtf happened to you Eminem?! we need songs we can sing along to!!! like "I'm Back" and a million other ones from back then!

replies.message: It's a soundtrack for a movie. "I'm back" stuff in a movie Ost would have been a bit odd don't you think?
It's easy to rap to it if you actually memorize the song but yeah it is hard to rap to some of his songs
correct... lol this comment was directed at all his recent shit, just happened to land on this song
guess ive finally had enough, this one did it haha
aaight i gotta go watch this sick shit real quick before i get too depressed lol https://youtu.be/ieaELPdeUuI
